title: Barbe Rouge
overview: In the 18th century, Redbeard was a fearsome and dreaded pirate nicknamed the "Demon of the Caribbean" by those who feared him. However, his temper has softened since adopting an orphaned baby discovered on a ship he attacked. Many years later, this baby, renamed Eric by Barbe-Rouge, has become an adult and takes part in his father's adventures aboard his ship, the Black Falcon. And there's no shortage of adventures: treasure hunts, battles, plots... Fortunately, Barbe-Rouge and Eric can count on a crew as talented as they are heterogeneous: Constance, a courageous young woman, Baba, a giant with the strength Herculean, or even Triple-Leg, a scientist with a wooden leg...
